content.rendered:
Chilli is an indispensable condiment of every Indian household. It is used in the daily diet in one form or the other. It is a rich source of vitamin A and C with good medicinal properties.

Varieties

BIRD’S EYE CHILLI(DHANI)

BYADAGI(KADDI)

ELLACHIPUR SANNAM-S4 TYPE

HINDPUR-S7

JWALA

KANTHARI-WHITE

KASHMIR CHILLI

MADHYA PRADESH G.T.SANNAM

GUNTUR SANNAM-S4 TYPE

Origin: Indian

Loadability: 14MT /40 Ft Cointainer

Packing: 25/50 Kg jute bag

Delivery: 15 days from order confirmation

excerpt.rendered:
India is the only country rich in chilli germplasm with varieties differing in pungency and flavours.

Chilli has two important constituents.

  • Red colour due to the pigment capsanthin
  • Pungency attributed to capsaicin
